inlineImageAndParagraph.text: The Decentro UPI Collections API is a comprehensive solution enabling businesses to accept payments via dynamic QR codes, payment links, and deep-links. It ensures streamlined operations with real-time status updates, virtual account integration for reconciliation, and support for recurring payments via UPI Autopay.

items.description: Generate dynamic QRs, payment links, or push collect requests to customers.
Customers approve payments via their preferred UPI apps or enter their MPIN.
Receive real-time webhooks and settle funds instantly to virtual accounts.
